headline: Prenatal and Newborn Genetic Testing Analysis Report 2025: Market Led by Illumina, Thermo Fisher Scientific, & Agilent through Non-Invasive Technology, Prenatal Screening, and Expanding Global Access
summary: The prenatal and newborn genetic testing market is expanding due to technological advancements in non-invasive methods, rising awareness of genetic disorders, and supportive policies. Key opportunities include increased adoption of NGS and cfDNA technologies, growing demand in Asia Pacific, and insurance coverage expansion.
